entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
